name: Maths Kombat ll
description:
Learning maths has never been so easy! Maths Kombat II - is a perfect blend of education & game, with a vast question bank covering over 300 concepts. It caters to CBSE curriculum of 9th class Maths. Detailed analysis of performance, voice guided crisp notes ensures conceptual clarity of kids. Play Maths Kombat II to clear your fundamental concepts.

Conquer the world with your skills! Get a chance to be a part of the Super Brain Club! Speed and accuracy will help you lead the game! The faster you workout, the more rewards, scholarship & money you earn. Liberty to learn concepts at your convenience! After playing this game, you will never go back to conventional online test. Learn Maths in a gamified way and also earn rewards for the same.

Topics
Number Systems
Polynomials
Coordinate Geometry
Linear Equations in 2 variables
Introduction to Euclid's Geometry
Lines and Angles
Triangles
Quadrilaterals
Circles
Area and Herons
Surface Areas & Volumes

If you like this app, please rate us 5* & drop a review. Your comments help us to make our apps even better!

Additional
- Tracker to keep tab of your weak concepts & improve
- Single player game with no number crunching required
